Description: Spectacular 3/4 BDRM farm house on 12.60 acres with 7 stall barn fenced pasture areas for up to 4 horses wooded horse trail fantastic landscaping w/great views. Large sunroom basement w/wet bar and walkout large living room w/pellet stove large kitchen. MSTR with full bath hardwood floors in 3 bedrooms cedar-lined closets 2500 to rent house only. 200/month per horse up to 4 horses.

Description: 2-LEVEL 1300 SFT 2BR 2BA SPACIOUS CONDO IN GLENSFORD. SHOWS WELL. HUGE LR w/FIRE PLACE MOLDINGS RECESS LIGHTS & PATIO DOOR. REN. KITCHEN w/GRANITE COUNTER & FLOOR. SEP DINING AREA. REN. BATHS w/GRANITE FLOORS. GOOD STORAGE SPACE. MBR ON 1ST FLOOR w/FULL BATH. CLOSE TO DC 495 SEVERAL ROUTES SHOPPING AMENITIES. SWIMMING POOL TENNIS & BASKET BALL COURTS. NO PETS SMOKING. GOOD RENT HIST MUST

Newly renovated beautiful townhouse in a well sought after neighborhood: new carpet freshly painted washer and dryer fenced yard big room and spacious bathroom(basement) close to major stores and entertainment. Lots of new additions.

Description: Cozy end unit home with a tranquil treeline rear view from the deck. Spacious basement with fireplace storage separate laundry room and walk out to backyard patio. Quaint dine-in kitchen. This is the perfect starter home. Prime location to Major Routes - Rt 50 Rt 450 & I-95. Pool Basketball Court Tennis Park shopping banks local eateries & more close by.

Description:
(301) 298-9244 - Beautiful End Unit Townhome! - Enjoy 3 spacious levels of fabulous living in this "roommate style" townhouse! First level boasts a supersized den w/fireplace (perfect for a 3rd bedroom) and office space, plus a laundry area. The 2nd level features a bonus room, eat-in kitchen, a large living space and 1/2 bath. The 3rd floor provides 2 XL bedrooms, one with an attached master bath and the other with access to the hall bath. You don't want to miss this one, you'll love it! Call for a tour 301-298-9244
(RLNE3467816) Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.
